name: StoneMilliner Asset Management LLP
goal: Stone Milliner Asset Management ("Stone Milliner") is a global alternative asset management company with offices in the UK and Switzerland. Established in January 2012, Stone Milliner manages a discretionary global macro strategy, investing across all asset classes with a focus on foreign exchange and fixed income, in both emerging and developed markets.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation
euInitiatives: We follow EU policies in the context of our professional activities. We are interested in learning how policymaking will impact economic conditions in the economies we are active in (developed and emerging markets).
